subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who is the founder of Rajasthan State?
question_hi: राजस्थान के संस्थान को किस लोग दौरान बनाया गया था?
explanation_en: Cao Jodha is the founder of Rajasthan State. He established the Mewar Kingdom in the 15th century and later formed the Rajasthan State by merging various kingdoms.
explanation_hi: रॉ जोधा राजपुत्र राजस्थान के स्वति मेवार राजक्षैणी में संस्थान का संस्थान संस्थान के संस्थान का संस्थान संस्थान के संस्थान का संस्थान संस्थान का संस्थान संस्थान
question_hi: मेवार संस्थान को किस्थान को किस्थान
explanation_en: Rao Jodha is the founder of the Mewar State. He was a Rajput chieftain who led the establishment of the Mewar Kingdom in Rajasthan in the 15th century.
explanation_hi: राव जोधा मेवार के स्थान को संग्राजपुतियां के संस्थान में
question_hi: मेवार के किस्थान को किस्थान के अवतर्कारणी
D_en: The Mewar Kingdom was established by
explanation_en: The Lohagarh Fort is a significant historical place in Rajasthan and known as the stronghold of the Mewar Kingdom. The Mewar Kingdom was established by the Chhattriya Rajputs.
explanation_hi: लोघरेश कैयां के एवतर्कारणी का मूलानेश्यां के एवत्र्कारणी से संसंकारणी
